channel.title: Seight Custom Cycling Wear: Popular Products
channel.description: A list of the popular products at Seight Custom Cycling Wear.

item.title: Breeze Standard Short Sleeve Jersey
item.description:
Are you looking for a comfy, reliable, and superior quality jersey at an economical price? Then the Seight Short Sleeve Jersey is what you need. Made from pure polyester, and designed with specially engineered quick drying micro fibre, it's your optimum solution when it comes to wicking mo..

Price: $71.82

item.title: Breeze Elite Long Sleeve Jersey
item.description:
Nothing provides you with protection and comfort when you are out for a ride like the Seight Elite Long Sleeve Jersey. Its wide surface area removes moisture from your body quickly to protect your skin against bacterial infections and odour. The high tech fibre f..

item.title: Breeze Elite Short Sleeve Jersey
item.description:
Outstanding performance, perfect fit, and comfort, ride like a pro in our Elite Short Sleeve Jersey. Its high performance fabrics perform brilliantly in wicking moisture from the body. Its fabric is UV rated, protecting you form the sun's harmful rays.

Offering a soft and s..

Price: $92.73

item.title: Breeeze Winter Arm Warmers
item.description:
Transform all your short sleeve cycling jerseys into full body coverage with our Seight Winter Arm Warmers. These arm warmers are made using full motion flexible fabrics, fleece lining and elastic grippers that equipe you for those cold rides.

<..

Price: $32.73

item.description:
You will in no doubt fall in love with our intricately designed polyester Seight Tech polo shirt. Made using a fast wicking fabric, it’s resilient to odour causing bacteria and allows moisture management..

item.title: Breeze Elite Bib Shorts
item.description:

item.title: Breeze Elite Pro Bib Shorts
item.description:
Perfect, immaculate, and incredible - is what best describes the Seight Elite Bib Shorts. It is indeed the top pro bib shorts ever made, bar none! The sublimated panel is made with 240gsm Lycra from Italy, while the unsublimated panel is 225gsm, whic..

item.title: Breeze Wind Vest
item.description:
When the weather is at its worst, our Water Resistant Vest is at its best. They are made from wind and water resistant polyester fabrics to enhance comfort and performance when you are riding. This vest is lightweight and breathable for an outstanding cycling experience. It has a mesh back or s..

Price: $63.64

item.description:
